abstract: Citigroup expects to see double-digit growth in assets serviced by its recently expanded Asia-Pacific prime brokerage arm, as it seeks more business with global hedge funds setting up in the region.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup expects to see double-digit growth in assets serviced by its recently expanded Asia-Pacific prime brokerage arm, as it seeks more business with global hedge funds setting up in the region.

headline.main: Citi Sees Opportunity in Asia-Pacific Hedge Funds
